readability_reflection: I think that concatenation was much more readable. + signs are already a common part of everyday language, and it follows the same logic in everyday life as it does in string concatenation.
comprehension_debugging: I have not had to use either method or technique to debug code. Code I've done prior was more straightforward with regards to strings.
preference_rationale: For the same reasons as before, string concatenation is just easier to understand. Much more readable.
learning_curve: To be fair, I did do a lot more work with concatenation. I've had multiple tasks that required use of concatenation for putting unknown string values together into a sentence.
suggestions_improvement: No suggestions, I think that string concatenation syntax is already readable enough.
